@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Encryption, post:6, topic:548975”][quote author=angelfallen link=topic=667885.msg4466805#msg4466805 date=1420566625]
You literally stole your media from http://2007.runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Dragon_scimitar
[/quote]

Yes, I do not hold any copyright for the images hence the links are still the same, if they weren’t it would then be considered stealing. This is also not considered as false advertising because the following Runescape images are what we have to offer.[/quote]
Good answer. And why no forums there kiddo? I must have the forums in order to feel like I’m complete.
